My biggest advice: Start coding, start now! üöÄ Don't wait for the perfect moment or the perfect course. Pick a problem, any problem, and try to solve it. Every expert was once a beginner who refused to give up!

Focus on fundamentals first! Data Structures and Algorithms are your best friends - master them and you'll find everything else becomes easier. Also, don't just code, understand why your code works. Thinking trumps typing! üí≠

Consistency beats intensity! 15 minutes of coding daily is better than 10 hours once a week. Also, don't be afraid to fail - every bug you fix, every problem you solve makes you stronger. Embrace the debugging journey! üêõ
